title: LUCIEN WHITE SAPPHIRE LEVERBACK, SILVER
description:
SOLD AS A PAIR.
The art deco-inspired Lucien drop earring is designed with a bright, white lab-grown sapphire. Set in silver and fastened to a delicate, sterling hook, she was designed to sit seamlessly alongside your own hoop and stud friends on the same ear.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Closure: Leverback



Medium: 2.00 CTW DEW
Large: 3.00 CTW DEW

Style Note:
Model wears 3 carat Lucien in the primary earring hole and 2 carat Lucien in the second earring hole.
What is Lab-Grown?
